name: Combat Style Master
text: You shift between combat styles, combining them to increased effect.
prerequisites: Improved Unarmed Strike, two or more style feats, base attack bonus +6 or monk level 5th.
benefit: You can switch your style as a free action. At the start of combat, pick one of your styles. You start the combat in that style, even in the surprise round.
normal: It takes a swift action to begin or switch your styles.
staminaText: When it is not your turn, you can spend 2 stamina points to take the free action to switch your style.
text_zh: 你能自如切换使用的流派，将它们衔接起来增加其效果。
prerequisites_zh: 精通徒手打击，至少两项流派专长，BAB+6或武僧5级。
benefit_zh: 你可以以一个自由动作切换你使用的流派。在战斗开始时，选择一种你拥有的流派。即使是在突袭轮，你也从战斗开始便启用该流派效果。
normal_zh: 启用或切换你的流派是一个迅捷动作。
staminaText_zh: 即使并非在你的回合，花费2点耐力你可以以自由动作切换流派。
